name: Loose Rain
description:
Entry for Touhou Fan Jam 7, "Deaf to all but the Song". Inspired by the song of the same name, Loose Rain is a short puzzle platformer where you use Tenshi Hinanawi's abilities to control the weather. Strike a keystone with her sword to change the intensity of the rain, and take advantage of the changing river height to progress.

Controllers are supported.

This is a derivative work of Touhou Project. Touhou Project and associated characters belong to Team Shanghai Alice / ZUN.
